messages: 729419ad76bda10eb66329bf4688d562 (09:44): what's the best way to create a website ? dreamweaver, classic enhanced notepads, cms ?
7f9405da4034bf43083e64b57302a8e6 (09:47): 729419ad76bda10eb66329bf4688d562, depends on your skillset and the the complexity of the issue at hand.
7f9405da4034bf43083e64b57302a8e6 (09:48): for example, i have written small web pages in appropriate text editors, but also used wordpress. currently i am programming a web app in python.
7f9405da4034bf43083e64b57302a8e6 (09:48): i would advise you to stay clear of dreamweaver or notepad derivates. there are much better editors out there.

7f9405da4034bf43083e64b57302a8e6 (09:49): 729419ad76bda10eb66329bf4688d562, if you found this IRC channel, maybe getting a text editor with HTML synthax highlighting and starting to code it by hand is not the worst idea, if it is not exceedingly complex.
7f9405da4034bf43083e64b57302a8e6 (09:52): as a text editor, i'd recommend geany <http://www.geany.org/> if you need a GUI editor or nano <http://www.nano-editor.org/> if you need a CLI editor.
7f9405da4034bf43083e64b57302a8e6 (09:52): also, ask other people. i might be wrong on this issue.

7f9405da4034bf43083e64b57302a8e6 (09:56): 729419ad76bda10eb66329bf4688d562, before you start, however, keep in mind that although fun and learning are the primary goals of all Enrichment Center activities, serious injuries may occur. For your own safety and the safety of others, please refrain from [static noise]

7f9405da4034bf43083e64b57302a8e6 (10:01): *** Please be advised that a noticeable taste of blood is not part of any HTML specification, but is an unintended side effect of the WHATWG Parser Material Emancipation Grid, which may, in semi-rare cases, emancipate XML namespaces, bogus comments and fingertips. ***
7f9405da4034bf43083e64b57302a8e6 (10:02): The WHATWG reminds you that the HTML5lib Companion Serializer will never threaten to stab you and, in fact, cannot speak.
729419ad76bda10eb66329bf4688d562 (10:07): I'm french then I struggle to understand the whole
7f9405da4034bf43083e64b57302a8e6 (10:07): 729419ad76bda10eb66329bf4688d562, oh. that last thing was supposed to be a joke.
7f9405da4034bf43083e64b57302a8e6 (10:09): also, do you plan to learn HTML? or do you just want to create a web site? if the latter, just use a simple popular CMS, like wordpress.
7f9405da4034bf43083e64b57302a8e6 (10:15): Jay C. Weber imagined the audio element, hehehe
729419ad76bda10eb66329bf4688d562 (10:22): i've got some questions to ask
729419ad76bda10eb66329bf4688d562 (10:22): ok let's assume i plan to build a website a to z
729419ad76bda10eb66329bf4688d562 (10:23): all the tags that constructs my page
729419ad76bda10eb66329bf4688d562 (10:23): i need to get into my css stylesheet
729419ad76bda10eb66329bf4688d562 (10:24): ok generally when i reach that level i'm already lost into work
729419ad76bda10eb66329bf4688d562 (10:24): i mean i never know where to begin the design of my page
729419ad76bda10eb66329bf4688d562 (10:25): and i'm not talking about converting the new html5 elements into block display
729419ad76bda10eb66329bf4688d562 (10:25): it's hell to build a website :-|
729419ad76bda10eb66329bf4688d562 (10:26): then I was wondering maybe it could be a little better to use softwares like dreamweaver
729419ad76bda10eb66329bf4688d562 (10:26): but i'm not sure about it since i've been told it's easier to make websites with but the code isn't neat, etc..

7f9405da4034bf43083e64b57302a8e6 (10:34): 729419ad76bda10eb66329bf4688d562, try to map out beforehand how your site is going to be structured. what is your specific problem area, building a stylesheet?
7f9405da4034bf43083e64b57302a8e6 (10:35): you may use firebug to experiment with styling then: <http://getfirebug.com/>
729419ad76bda10eb66329bf4688d562 (10:36): but my primary issue is I never find the time to dive into a project for I feel like I want to build a bunch of websites
729419ad76bda10eb66329bf4688d562 (10:37): also I all the time dive into projects on my very own
7f9405da4034bf43083e64b57302a8e6 (10:38): 729419ad76bda10eb66329bf4688d562, if you *do not have time*, just use a popular CMS, like wordpress: <http://wordpress.org/>
729419ad76bda10eb66329bf4688d562 (10:38): i'd like to find people out to get into some projects
7f9405da4034bf43083e64b57302a8e6 (10:38): however, if you want to learn, use aforementioned tools.
729419ad76bda10eb66329bf4688d562 (10:41): i'm going to be a few nosey
729419ad76bda10eb66329bf4688d562 (10:41): but could you share your websites if you've got
